YALLA ABHIRAM CHOWDARY.name: YALLA ABHIRAM CHOWDARY
YALLA ABHIRAM CHOWDARY.summary: Aspiring Data Engineer and Machine Learning Enthusiast skilled in Python, data analysis, and AI-based automation. Experienced in developing predictive models, IoT-integrated intelligent systems, and data-driven solutions to solve real-world challenges.
skills: Machine Learning: Supervised & Unsupervised Learning, Ensemble Learning, Model Evaluation & Tuning
Generative AI: LLM Fine-Tuning, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
Libraries & Frameworks: Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, SciPy, Scikit-learn, Keras, TensorFlow, OpenCV
Tools: GitHub, Hugging Face, Render, Docker, VScode, Jupyter Notebook, Excel, Google Colab, OpenAI & Gemini APIs
Database & Web Technologies: SQL, MongoDB, Flask, HTML, CSS
Soft Skills: Depth-oriented, Self-motivated, Problem Solving, Teamwork, Good Communication
education: Bachelor of Technology, Electronics and Communication Engineering (CGPA: 8.4), Minor: Machine Learning, Pre-University Course: CGPA 9.8 - Rajiv Gandhi University of Knowledge Technologies (RGUKT) –IIIT RK Valley (2020–2026)
SSC (10th Grade) (CGPA: 10.0) - Board of Secondary Education of Andhra Pradesh, AP Model School & Junior College, Ramagiri (2019–2020)
projects: EEG-Based Stress Detection and Mental Workload Monitoring System: Developed a multimodal stress detection system combining EEG signals, facial behavior (blink rate, emotion, head movement), and questionnaire inputs. Trained CNN and XGBoost models for cognitive state analysis and applied Mediapipe for real-time facial analytics. Deployed the complete Flask-based system on Render for live stress visualization and automated reporting.

AI-Powered Crop Recommendation and Smart Agricultural Advisory System: Built an AI-IoT crop advisory system using soil, weather, and investment data for optimal recommendations. Trained Random Forest models for yield forecasting and dynamic decision support using real-time environmental data. Deployed the Streamlit-based application–Blynk integration for visualization and remote monitoring.

ExpressTune – AI Music Player Based on Facial Expressions: Built a real-time emotion-based music recommendation app using OpenCV and deep learning for facial expression analysis. Integrated emotion classification and playlist automation for personalized music experiences.

AI-Powered Predictive Analytics Models: Developed regression and classification models for car price estimation, diabetes detection, and IPL match prediction. Utilized Python, Pandas, and Scikit-learn for end-to-end data preprocessing, model building, and evaluation.
experience: AI Intern at Antt AI Labs Private Limited (Aug 2025 – Oct 2025, Bengaluru): Designed and deployed voice-controlled AI agents using the OpenAI platform and Gemini APIs for real-time automation. Integrated FastMCP-based robotic pick-and-place workflows, boosting operational efficiency by 25%. Gained hands-on experience with Action Transformers, SmolVLA, NLP, prompt engineering, and TypeScript for intelligent agent development.

Research Intern at IIT Tirupati (May 2025 – Jul 2025, Tirupati): Explored the biomedical applications of BCIs, focusing on EEG and MEG devices to improve human-computer interaction. Developed a single-channel EEG-based framework for real-time mental state and stress classification. Extracted neurophysiological features (Beta/Alpha, Theta/Beta, spectral entropy) using advanced signal processing. Built an ensemble of XGBoost, LightGBM, and Random Forest models achieving 85% accuracy across five cognitive states. Applied SHAP-based explainability and deployed the system via Flask for live EEG prediction and visualization.

Machine Learning Intern at InternPe (Jan 2024 – Feb 2024, Remote): Built predictive models for healthcare and automobile pricing using Python, Pandas, and Scikit-learn. Conducted preprocessing, feature engineering, and model tuning to improve predictive performance. Contributed to end-to-end development of ML pipelines supporting analytics and deployment tasks.
achievements: Inspire Award– Awarded by the Ministry of Science & Technology for innovation in science.
Essay & Painting Competition Winner– Recognized by the Ministry of Water & Resources.
Technical Champion– Multiple technical quiz wins in college and school.
Winner at College-Level Hackathons– Developed AI-IoT-based solutions, including an AI-based Strabismus Detection system, as part of an IIT Tirupati collaborative project.
certifications: Python for Data Science – Cognitive Class
C, C++, MySQL, DSA, MATLAB – Great Learning
Data Mining for Data Science – Mind Luster

MUDUNURI SEETA RAMA KARTHIKEYA VARMA.name: MUDUNURI SEETA RAMA KARTHIKEYA VARMA

education.degree: Board of Secondary Education Of Andhra Pradesh

projects.title: GPT FORGE - SMALL LANGUAGE MODEL
description: Enforced a custom learning rate scheduler by combining linear warmup and cosine annealing to ensure smoother convergence during training.
Integrated PyTorch autocast for mixed-precision training, leading to a 30% reduction in GPU memory usage, and achieved more coherent text generation than GPT-2.

projects.title: MEDIOLOGUE
description: Built an AI system to extract key medical insights from doctor-patient conversation.
Used Whisper ASR+NMT Model for Telugu-to-English transcription.

projects.title: RICE RADAR
description: Attained a 97.5% precision score for robust classification during model testing.
Reducing manual identification time by 30% and improving decision-making in agriculture.

projects.title: ARMOR GAZE
description: Fine-tuned the YOLOv8 model on a helmet dataset to identify whether individuals on bikes are wearing helmets or not.
Mitigated severe class imbalance using Albumentation-based data augmentation, leading to a ~15% improvement in recall and better generalization on minority class examples.
Accomplished high validation performance: Precision of 93.6%, Recall of 96.4%, and mAP@50 of 97.5%, indicating strong model accuracy and robustness.

experience.title: Machine Learning Intern
description: Designed and implemented a hybrid CNN-LSTM model to predict milling forces from spindle current signals, reducing reliance on physical sensors by 30–40%.
Conducted systematic hyperparameter tuning, exploring variations in kernel size, filters, LSTM cell counts, and learning rates, leading to a 15% increase in model accuracy.
Trained a robust neural network to model non-linear and delayed relationships between current and force signals with Keras.

experience.title: Generative AI Intern
description: Built and trained a model on the CIFAR-10 dataset, achieving ~85% test accuracy, while experimenting with architecture variations to improve performance.
Enhanced model robustness using normalization, data augmentation, dropout, and batch normalization reducing overfitting by 20–25%.

MUDUNURI SEETA RAMA KARTHIKEYA VARMA.full_text:
MUDUNURI  SEETA  RAMA  KARTHIKEYA  VARMA  
 https://github.com/meranamkarthikeyavarma /  Palakol,  Andhra  Pradesh,  India   seeta4ml @gmail.com   8919104346    in/seeta -rama -karthikeya -varma -mudunuri -138464343 / 
 
SUMMARY  
 
 
SKILLS  
• Machine  Learning : Supervised  & Unsupervised  Learning,  Ensemble  Learning,  Model  Evaluation  & Tuning  
• Deep  Learning : ANN,  CNN,  LSTM,  Transfer Learning  Hyperparameter  Optimization  
• Generative  AI: Quantization,  LLMs  / SLMs  Fine-Tuning,  RAG  
• Libraries  and Frameworks : LangChain,  Pandas,  NumPy,  Matplotlib,  Seaborn,  SciPy,  Scikit  Learn,  Keras,  TensorFlow,  OpenCV,  Beautiful  Soup  
• Tools : Hugging  Face,  Power  BI, Render,  Docker  
• Programming Languages  : C, Python, Java, C++  
• Soft Skills : Depth -oriented, P ragmatic, Self -motivated  
 
 
EXPERIENCE  
Machine  Learning  Intern  
IIT TIRUPATI  May  2025  – June  2025 , Tirupati  
 Designed  and implemented  a hybrid  CNN -LSTM  model  to predict  milling  forces  from spindle  current  signals,  reducing  reliance  on physical  sensors  by 30–40%.  
 Conducted  systematic  hyperparameter  tuning,  exploring  variations  in kernel size,  filters,  LSTM  cell counts,  and learning  rates,  leading  to a 15%  increase  in model accuracy.  
 Trained  a robust neural  network  to model non -linear  and delayed  relationships  between  current  and force signals  with Keras.  
 
Generative  AI Intern  
Blackbuck  Engineers  June  2024  - July 2024 , Online  
  
Built  and trained  a model  on the CIFAR -10 dataset,  achieving  ~85%  test accuracy,  while  experimenting  with architecture  variations  to improve  performance.  
 Enhanced  model  robustness  using  normalization,  data augmentation,  dropout,  and batch  normalization  reducing  overfitting  by 20–25%.  
 
PROJECTS  
GPT  FORGE  - SMALL  LANGUAGE  MODEL  
  
 Enforced  a custom learning rate  scheduler by  combining  linear warmup  and cosine annealing to ensure smoother convergence  during training.  
 Integrated  PyTorch  autocast  for mixed -precision  training,  leading  to a 30%  reduction  in GPU memory  usage,  and achieved  more  coherent  text generation  than GPT-2. 
 
MEDIOLOGUE  
 Built  an AI system  to extract  key medical  insights  from  doctor -patient  conversation.  
 Used  Whisper  ASR+NMT  Model  for Telugu -to-English  transcription.  
  
 
RICE  RADAR  
  
 Attained  a 97.5%  precision  score  for robust  classification  during  model testing.  
Reducing  manual  identification  time by 30% and improving  decision -making  in agriculture.  
 
ARMOR  GAZE  
 Fine-tuned  the YOLOv8  model  on a helmet dataset to  identify  whether  individuals on  bikes  are wearing  helmets  or not. 
Mitigated  severe  class  imbalance  using  Albumentation  -based  data augmentation,  leading  to a ~15%  improvement  in recall  and better  generalization  on minority  class  examples . 
 Accomplished high  validation perf ormance : Precision of 93.6%, Recall of 96. 4%, and mAP@50 of 97.5%, indicating strong model accurac y and robustness .
